status: お狐様の異類婚姻譚, 狐狸大人的异族婚姻谭, 여우님의 이종간 혼인담
description:
Description :
        Yukio was kidnapped as a child from the human world and grew up in the spirit world. Running a pharmacy as an adult one day a man Shirotsuki appeared in front of Yukio, and married her. But after the wedding he abandoned her and they were divorced.Suddenly, he appears and ask Yukio for a reconciliation-?!
